live_updates: We are working alongside BC Hydro to restore services as soon as Hydro is returned to the area.  Thank you for your patience on this very windy evening.

27266.summary: Some customers in the Norberry area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
